this_title: Hush, tonight the dead are dreaming loudly
trans_title: 嘘，今晚死人在大声做梦
introduction: On the anniversary of a political massacre, the survivors are gathering together to mourn for their loved ones. Unexpectedly, one of the dead shows up and tries to sabotage the ceremony.
chinese_title: 嘘，今晚死人在大声做梦
foreign_title: Hush, tonight the dead are dreaming loudly
